mapper.select: SELECT A1.*,B1.*,COUNT(B1.ACTIVITY_ID) AS COUNT FROM AMTF_ACTIVITY A1 LEFT JOIN AMTF_USERACTIVITY B1 ON A1.ACTIVITY_ID = B1.ACTIVITY_ID LEFT JOIN AMTF_USERACTIVITY C1 ON C1.ACTIVITY_ID = B1.ACTIVITY_ID WHERE C1.USERACTIVITY_NAME = #{name} GROUP BY A1.ACTIVITY_ID

SELECT A1.*,B1.*,COUNT(B1.ACTIVITY_ID) AS COUNT FROM AMTF_ACTIVITY A1 LEFT JOIN AMTF_USERACTIVITY B1 ON A1.ACTIVITY_ID = B1.ACTIVITY_ID LEFT JOIN AMTF_ACTIVITY C1 ON C1.ACTIVITY_ID = A1.ACTIVITY_ID WHERE C1.ACTIVITY_NAME = #{name} GROUP BY A1.ACTIVITY_ID
SELECT B1.* FROM AMTF_ACTIVITY A1 LEFT JOIN AMTF_ACTIVITY_COMMENT B1 ON A1.ACTIVITY_ID = B1.ACTIVITY_ID WHERE A1.ACTIVITY_ID= #{id} ORDER BY B1.ACTIVITY_COMMENT_TIME DESC
SELECT * FROM AMTF_ACTIVITY_COMMENT_REPLY WHERE ACTIVITY_COMMENT_ID = #{id} ORDER BY ACTIVITY_COMMENT_REPLY_TIME DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM AMTF_ACTIVITY_FABULOUS WHERE ACTIVITY_ID = #{id}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM AMTF_ACTIVITY_FABULOUS WHERE ACTIVITY_ID = #{id} AND user_id = #{userid}
